old: 魔弓の証　エレメントアーチャー戦術試練
new: Element Archer Tactics Trial: A Magick Bow

old:
エレメントアーチャーの基本戦術を学ぶため
修練の祠にて試練に挑む
new:
In order to learn the basic tactics of Element Archer,
challenge the trial of the Training Chapel

old: 修練の祠内のウィルソンと話す
new: Speak with Wilson in the Training Chapel

old: 闘波の魔眼で敵２体を捉えよ
new: Capture 2 enemies within Magick Eye: Seeker

old: 闘波の矢で敵を攻撃せよ
new: Attack an enemy with Seeker Arrow

old: 最適距離から闘波の魔眼で敵を３秒以上捉え攻撃せよ
new:
Get to the optimum distance away from enemies while using
Magick Eye: Seeker, and attack them for more than 3 seconds.

old: 闘波の魔眼の集中力を最大まで溜めて攻撃せよ
new: Fully charge a Seeker arrow, and loose it at an enemy.

old: 仲間に助真の魔眼を成功せよ
new: Lock onto an ally with Magick Eye: True Aid.

old: 仲間の体力を助真の矢で回復せよ
new: Recover an ally's health with True Aid arrows.

old: 癒しの装で自分の体力を回復せよ
new: Recover your health with Healing Shroud.

old: 前蹴りで敵に攻撃せよ
new: Attack an enemy with Front Kick.

old: 最奥の敵にしがみつき奮わせ直魔矢をせよ
new:
Cling to the enemy in the deeper chamber and use
Invigorating Magick Arrow.

old: 敵怒り中に助真の構えでシークレットコアを発見せよ
new:
While the enemy is enraged, reveal its secret core
with Magick Eye: True Aid

old: 最奥にある＜魔弓の証＞を入手する
new: Collect the proof of completing the trial

old: 白竜神殿のレンテンに経緯を報告する
new: Report back to Renton in the White Dragon Temple
